title: Authors and Citation
text: Grogan-Kaylor (2023). SSWPEGcolors: Use SSWPEG colors R graphs. R package version 1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {SSWPEGcolors: Use SSWPEG colors in R graphs},   author = {Andrew Grogan-Kaylor},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.0}, }

what: Use SSWPEG colors in R graphs
title: Use SSWPEG colors in R graphs
Use SSWPEG colors in R graphs
text: need install devtools already done : install.packages("devtools") , use devtools install SSWPEGcolors package GitHub: devtools::install_github("agrogan1/SSWPEGcolors")

title: Use SSWPEG colors in R graphs
Use SSWPEG colors in R graphs
text: library(SSWPEGcolors) hist(iris$Petal.Length, col = SSWPEGcolors()) hist(iris$Petal.Width, col = SSWPEGcolors()) library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Length, fill = Species)) + geom_histogram() + scale_fill_manual(values = SSWPEGcolors())

title: SSWPEG color palette — SSWPEGcolors
code: hist(iris$Petal.Length, col = SSWPEGcolors())  plot(iris$Petal.Length, iris$Sepal.Length, col = SSWPEGcolors(), pch = 19)
